item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it." -- Confucious

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Yu-ting add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Live everyday as if it were your last because someday you're going to be right." -- Muhammad Ali
